input.sentences: production came into the meeting today to show off the new line . it began with some brown pants .
next were some pastel colored nightgowns .
they came in two colors | pink and a reddish orange .
they were really excited about the jackets and believed they would be next season 's best sellers .
output.sentences: Debra led off her production meeting trying to sell a used pair of her pants.
No one liked the brown color so she figured why not and try to sell them something that she sleeps in.
Still unsuccessful in pawning off her used clothing items Debra decides to bust out the goods.
Debra thought how could anyone not want these hideous pink blazers?
But indeed, no one did want her hideous pink blazers.
